post:
Will Hosting was established in February 2010 with a mission to provide Affordable and Reliable hosting services. We're excited to offer another great deal to the LET community.

Stock Limit: 70
128MB OpenVZ | Phoenix AZ
128MB RAM

700GB Transfer on a 500mbps Port
15GB HDD RAID 10 Storage Space
Unmanaged
$22/year!
[Click Here to Order](https://willhosting.com/portal/cart.php?a=add&pid=119)

Product Addons
Additional IPV4 Addresses - $1.00/month per IP

How can you pay us?
We currently accept all major credit cards as well as Paypal.

Test IP & Speed Test
Test IP: 192.110.163.62
Test File: http://192.110.163.62/100MB.test

Datacenter Information
All Servers are hosted on nodes provided by our long time hosting partner IOFLOOD in a private cage at the PhoenixNAP datacenter in Phoenix, AZ.

Need a different configuration?
Just ask! We can accommodate most custom quote requests.

Questions?
